resources.string:
Ishyura Imisanzu 



Twiyemeje kuba ikiraro kigeza ubufasha ugiye kuduha aho bugomba kugera 100%.


Itsinda ry'ubugenzuzi rizakorana n'itsinda rishinzwe imari mu mikoresherezwe y'ubu bufasha utanze mu buryo buciye mu mucyo


Kwishyura umusanzu cyangwa gutanga ubufasha unyura kuri code ya MoMo:


*182*8*1*5024234# (Amazina ni NKURAGE FOR CHARITY)


Cyangwa ukoreshe Konti ya Equity Bank kuri 4009200888790 (Amazina ni NKURAGE FOR CHARITY)


Cyangwa Worldremit 0790929749 (Amazina ni NKURAGE FOR CHARITY)


Ukimara kwishyura, andikira ubutumwa bugufi cyangwa muhamagare 0790929749 kugirango ubimenyeshe umubitsi.


Imana ihe umugisha ibiganza byawe bifashije abafite ubumuga
